definitions.definition: ( architecture , art , obsolete ) A grotesque representation of a figure; a gargoyle .
( often in the plural ) A ludicrous gesture or act; ridiculous behaviour; caper .
examples: I'm fed up with your constant antics in class. Please behave yourself!

definitions.definition: A grotesque performer or clown , buffoon .

main_definition: ( architecture , art , obsolete ) A grotesque representation of a figure; a gargoyle .
secondary_definitions: ( often in the plural ) A ludicrous gesture or act; ridiculous behaviour; caper .
A grotesque performer or clown , buffoon .

definitions.definition: A pose, often exaggerated, in anticipation of an action; for example, a brief squat before jumping

main_definition: ( animation ) A pose, often exaggerated, in anticipation of an action; for example, a brief squat before jumping
